document_data.name: Jasmine dust
document_data.mainbody: '''Jasmine dust''' was an exotic powder made out of [[Jasmine (plant)|jasmine]] plants in [[Kara-Tur]] that was commonly used as a type of [[perfume]].
document_data.Description: Jasmine dust was a pleasantly scented powder that, when sprinkled on skin, blended with body's natural odors. It drastically improved even the most sweaty adventurer's scent.
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], an exotic perfume merchant [[Quintessa]] could be found in the [[Chateau Elite]] inn in the [[Money Quarter]] of [[Daggerford]] selling jasmine dust along with other scented goods. She readily dispensed the pleasant dust as a free sample.
